title: 48.194 INSTALLMENT SALES CONTRACTS; LOANS.
text: A person may enter into a credit sale or service contract for sale to a state or national bank doing business in this state, and a bank may purchase and enforce the contract under the terms and conditions set forth in sections 47.59, subdivisions 2 and 4 to 14; and 51A.386, subdivision 4. A state bank or national bank may extend credit pursuant to the terms and conditions set forth in sections 47.59, 47.60, and 51A.386, subdivision 4.
